eventParts.text: I’m sorry, guys, can we take a little break?
I… I don’t know. I feel strange.
Well, you’re not lonely anymore. You’re not used to that, are you?
I’m really not! I’m not sure I like this feeling. What if I can’t become lonely again?
I’m sure it will be okay. If you want to be lonely, just be alone for a while.
But what if that doesn’t work? What if I can’t go back to Windy Peaks and be a scholar anymore?

eventConsequence.selectionText: Sophie, I’m sure you can go back to being lonely after this adventure is over if that’s what you want. If you want to be a scholar, I’m sure you can be!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Heh, thanks. I guess I can always try to go back to being lonely later. It’ll probably work out. 

Sophie gains +2 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: It’s alright if you’re not lonely anymore. I know it might be scary, but other emotions are okay. You just need to get used to it.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah, I know. I’ll try. 

Sophie gains +2 caution!

evName: Late_Sophie emos (NEEDS TO TRIGGER WHEN NOT LONELY)
